players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Bob, can you tell me more about what happened last night?"
Diana: "I am the Mafioso and I killed Charlie last night. Stay cautious, as there might be another Mafioso among us."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Alice
